name: The Entropic Coil
data: It decreases the users constitution unbelievably much.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration magnificently.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'order from chaos'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'chaos theory'.
It decreases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'adaption of order'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'adaption of chaos'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'chaos from invariance'.
